cast.name: 约翰·卡波迪斯 John Capodice

introduction: Desert Rose is an erotic thriller that takes you through one man's life experience. Mitch, our leading man, is an ex-Desert Storm hero with a lot of bad luck. After loosing his wife and kids, his life encounters another pitfall when Mitch's accounting client, Donny Diamond, a former pro-football player, accuses Mitch of embezzlement and hires a couple of thugs to murder him. Mitch is left for dead in the desert--or so they think--rescued and nursed back to health by a gorgeous women named, Angela Rose. As Mitch regains his strength, he realizes his life has been a waste and falls deeply in love with Angela, his guardian angel. Mitch, rejuvenated and ready for battle, returns to town.
